header.title: Artifex.AI Studio Pro
header.subtitle: From product descriptions to video storyboards, bring your ideas to life with AI.

storyboardSettings.title: Creative Direction
storyboardSettings.videoNote: Note: Video aspect ratio is inherited from Image Settings. Resolution and frame rate are automatically determined by the model for optimal quality.

mediaArtGenerator.title: Media Art Generator
mediaArtGenerator.selectToPreview: Select a painting to see a preview here.

mediaArtStyles.subtleMotionDesc: Gentle, flowing movements that bring the painting to life.
mediaArtStyles.parallaxDesc: Creates a 2.5D effect by moving layers to simulate depth.
mediaArtStyles.dreamlikeDesc: Surreal and hypnotic, with elements morphing and blending.
mediaArtStyles.elementalDesc: Focuses on animating natural elements like water, clouds, and light.

wandererSeaFog.title: Wanderer above the Sea of Fog

galleryModal.title: My Gallery
galleryModal.noProjects: You haven't saved any projects yet.

apiKeyInstructions.title: Gemini API Key Required
apiKeyInstructions.welcome: Welcome! To use this application, you need to provide your Google Gemini API key.
apiKeyInstructions.howTo: How to set up your API key:
apiKeyInstructions.step2: Set it as an environment variable named {{apiKey}} in your execution environment.
apiKeyInstructions.step3: Once the key is set, please reload this application.
apiKeyInstructions.disclaimer: Your API key is used directly by the application and is never stored or shared.

errors.loadProjects: Could not load saved projects from the database.
errors.loadProjectFailed: Failed to load the selected project.
errors.productNameAndFeaturesRequired: Product Name and Key Features are required.
errors.paintingRequired: Please select a painting to animate.
errors.paintingNotFound: Could not find the selected painting data.

prompts.deleteProjectConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this project?
prompts.storyboardIdeaFromDescription: Create a short video ad for {{productName}}. The ad should highlight its key features: {{keyFeatures}}. The tone should be {{tone}}. Here is the product description for inspiration: "{{description}}"
prompts.deletePanelConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete Panel {{index}}?
prompts.noProjectsToExport: There are no projects to export.
prompts.importConfirm: This will import {{count}} projects. Existing projects with the same ID will be overwritten. Continue?

tooltips.saveToGallery: Save the current project to your in-app gallery.
tooltips.exportProject: Save the current project as a file (.json) to your computer.
